title: Constant disconnects...
body:
I'm not sure if this is for everyone, but for some reason, me and my friend keep getting disconnected.  It's either when we're in lobby, or in champ select.  I just got a queue dodge timer punishment because my client dropped me, and I know it's not my internet because everything else works fine.

And, while writing this, I got another disconnect while in champ select.  I'm starting to get really annoyed with this constant disconnect, and getting punished with a dodge timer.  All I want to do is play this game :(... riot, pleeeeeaaase :'(

replies.body: its happening to many people, my friend kept having it happen to him and just had a game of aram where 3 ppl dropped at the same second on my team but none on enemy team. it was a good game too.
im having a similar problem i bug splat every time on the load screen now

Are you and your friend on the same network, or different locations?  Even though your net might seem fine you can still have problems reaching a specific servers.  In this case it sounds like you've got some network settings blocking you from reaching most of our services.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up these blocks.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which provides additional firewall auto-config steps.  I hope that helps!

We're not on the same network.  I live in Canada and he's in the States.  We also finally got into a game where the enemy team had 3 people drop at the same time and only 1 was able to come back.  And looking at the threads, I'm not the only one who had the issue.  I haven't been on since this post.  It was just getting utterly ridiculous with the disconnects, but I'm hoping you guys fixed it.
